---
title: "Teto Remuneratório (PL 6726/2016)"
output: html_document
---

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(vistime)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

# Create chart with all tasks.
data <- read_csv("../data/vis/tramitacao/data-camara.csv")

# Custom tooltip
data$tooltip <- ifelse(data$end == ymd(Sys.Date()),
                       paste0("<b>", data$label,
                              "</b> \n Início: ", data$start,
                              "<b>\n Em andamento </b>"),
                       paste0("<b>", data$label,
                              "</b> \n Início: ", data$start,
                              "\n Fim: ", data$end))

vistime(data, events="label", groups="group", title="Fases da tramitação", tooltips = "tooltip", colors = "color", showLabels=FALSE)
```
